review: Worst Assassin Class i've ever seen in my entire life

Reason why i like this game :- Because it's coop- Dem mods- Coach and Zoey death scream (using vocalize ofc)- Zoey is sexy af- BLOODS, BLOODS, AND MORE BLOODS!!!- Do u guys know about the Grenade Launcher glitch?- You can Goomba Stomp the zombies- WOW!!! MOLOTOVS CAN BOUNCE OFF THE WALLReason why i hate this game :- Stupid bots can't revive someone (while playing on campaign)- The bots is hacking (while playing infected on versus)- Infinite ammo on pistol (too ez and not realistic)- Sometimes, there is 2 - 3 tanks spawns on Valve Servers (not in the 'The Sacrifice' map)9.11/10 This game is fun af
